title: The Nobel Prize
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,045 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 930L

description: The Nobel Prize is the most illustrious nonmilitary award in the world. Although not without controversy, the Nobel Prize has a legacy of honoring great thinkers throughout time. The Nobel Prize is a detailed look at the history of this award and some of its most well-known recipients. The book can also be used to teach students how to discern the author's point of view and to effectively summarize. The book and lesson are also available for levels W and Z.
